title: Fortinet FortiSIEM 命令注入漏洞（CVE-2025-25256）技术细节披露
title_translated: Fortinet FortiSIEM Command Injection Vulnerability (CVE-2025-25256) Technical Details Disclosure
summary: A critical command injection vulnerability in the Fortinet FortiSIEM system allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands through a specially crafted request. The flaw is due to improper input filtering in the phMonitor service, which can be exploited under specific conditions.
